entry.def: A frontage of a building is a wall which faces a public place such as a street or a river.

example.ex: The restaurant has a river frontage.

means.word_mean: 1. the extent of the front of shop or plot of land (as along a street or river etc)
2. the direction in which something (such as a building) faces
3. the face or front of a building
